meanings.definition: A type of single-celled organism that can move and feed by extending pseudopods.
meanings.sent1: The myxamoebas were seen under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study myxamoebas to learn about their behavior.
meanings.sent3: The myxamoebas had a race to see who could reach the food first.
meanings.sent4: In the pond of life, myxamoebas are the tiny explorers.
meanings.sent5: The teacher used a video to show how myxamoebas move and feed.
